channel.title: How Do I Let Other People Play On My Server?
channel.description: ok so my server ip to get on is like either 'localhost' or '0.0.0.0'...and no1 can get on mine...i have no-ip and i set up a server ip there but wont work...i want to know how i can get any1 to play on my server...the server ip i tried to use is [b]prodoscape.no-ip.info[/b] so please some1 tell me how?help

item.title: How Do I Let Other People Play On My Server?
item.dc:creator: @frapan frapan
item.description:
@frapan wrote:

u nedd to now ur i adres. http://whatsmyip.org (at the top),have moparscape client.other pople nedd to enter ur server ip in mopar,and connect to you

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Let Other People Play On My Server?

item.title: How Do I Let Other People Play On My Server?
item.dc:creator: @Madman094 Madman094
item.description:
@Madman094 wrote:

ok so my server ip to get on is like either ‘localhost’ or ‘0.0.0.0’…and no1 can get on mine…i have no-ip and i set up a server ip there but wont work…i want to know how i can get any1 to play on my server…the server ip i tried to use is prodoscape.no-ip.info
so please some1 tell me how?help
